title: Embedded View
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ A game is live

AND

+ The user is logged into an entitled MLB.tv account
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user navigates to the Home page from the navigation options

AND

+ The embedded video player with a live game is displayed on the Home page
custom_expected:
THEN

+ Playback will be functioning as expected

AND

+ The user is able to view the game without having to launch the MLB.tv video player from the Games EPG

title: Autoplay
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user has Autoplay Video enabled in their MLB app's accessibility settings
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ Navigating to the Home page

AND

+ A live game video player is available to view
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The Live Mode player will autoplay 

AND

+ The user can utilize the Play/Pause buttons

title: Autoplay Disabled
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user has Autoplay Video disabled in their MLB app's accessibility settings
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ Navigating to the Home page

AND

+ A live game video player is available to view
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The Live Mode player will NOT autoplay

AND

+ The user can begin playback by utilizing the Play button on the video player.

title: Starting Point
custom_preconds:
GIVEN 

+ Autoplay is not enabled in the MLB app settings

AND

+ The user has navigated to the Home page

AND

+ An embedded live game video player is available to interact with
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ Attempting to play back the live game
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user is able to play the game from .beginning, .livepoint, or .atTime (elapsedTime)

AND

+ When starting at .beginning, the broadcast should begin at the broadcast_start time from the milestones call

OR

+ The broadcast will begin at stream start if available
